data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of La Libertad to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Libertad, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in La Libertad, El Salvador.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 335,988 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of La Libertad who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Turk people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, encourage every believer in La Libertad, El Salvador to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in La Libertad, El Salvador. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, let it be said of the 411,712 lost in La Libertad that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: La Libertad
location.cities_list: Santa Tecla, Antiguo Cuscatlán, Quezaltepeque, La Libertad, Zaragoza
location.cities_list_w_pop: Santa Tecla (124,694), Antiguo Cuscatlán (33,767), Quezaltepeque (28,886), La Libertad (16,855), Zaragoza (11,749)
